articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets New Irish Ambassador
    Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- New Irish Ambassador e.p. to the DPRK Paul Anthony Murray presented his credentials to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday.
 Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, was on hand.    
 Kim Yong Nam conversed with the ambassador after receiving the credentials.
